H3.text: who carried the us flag in the 2014 olympics. Julie Chu

A4.text: American nordic combined skier Todd Lodwick was the flag bearer of Team USA for the Parade of Nations during the opening ceremony.

A5.text: Four-time ice hockey Olympian Julie Chu was the flag bearer during the closing ceremonies.
